article.title: SBC Global to Provide Telecommunications to Naval Surface Warfare Center
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: SBC Global Services Incorporated, Honolulu, Hawaii, is being awarded a $7 million contract to provide consolidated telecommunications services to the Naval Surface Warfare Center, Port Hueneme, California.Â The Port Hueneme Division, Naval Surface Warfare Center is the contracting activity.
